The CR chimed that Grizzletrons repairs were complete. (Sort of like baking
a cake, to bad Grizzltron's only half baked.) Veratis (Not all there to
begin with) stood at the controls checking the bots status, all seemed to be
intact so he opened the chamber, "Greetings Grizzltron, was it? My name is
Veratis, you are my guest for as long as you'd like to stay." the old bot
watches for any sudden movements from the bear hoping to avoid a repeat
performance from the cave. "Is there anything I can do for you?" the
scientist wasn't sure what to expect, in a one on one battle, what could a
bot older than he could remember do against the younger, stronger looking
bot that had been brought before him?

(His logic circuits could have been repaired, his sanity is entirely up yo
you.)
